Package com.luox6.conway

Class ConwayMap

java.lang.Object
com.luox6.conway.ConwayMap
public class ConwayMap
extends java.lang.Object
Main class stores the conway map and process ticks

      status - Cell status
      Returns:
      true if set successfully, false otherwise

    • getCell

      public java.lang.Integer getCell​(int row, int col)
      Get cell status with given coordinates. Out of bound index will be remapped into valid coordinates
      Parameters:
      row - Map row index
      col - Map col index
      Returns:
      cell status
